blogPost.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. ⠀ Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
blogPost.body: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. ⠀ Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
blogPost.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 利用Zoom业界领先的视频优先通信平台的性能、规模和可靠性，加速您的开发和构建完全可定制的基于视频的应用。⠀每月可免费使用10,000分钟会话。
localize.tagline: 构建完全可定制的基于视频的应用程序

localize.description: 利用Zoom業界領先的視頻優先通信平臺的性能、規模和可靠性，加速您的開發和構建完全可定製的基於視頻的應用。⠀每月可免費使用10,000分鐘會話。
localize.tagline: 構建完全可定製的基於視頻的應用程序

previous.excerpt: Bankiom is kind of Expedia for your money Track all your money Send money like texting Grow your wealth like a pro in a fun way Your mission if you choose to accept it is to catch our bugs & provide your feedback Let’s change the world one account at a time!
previous.title: Bankiom - Smart online banking app to connect your money to your dream

localize.description: Bankiom是一种为你的钱而设的Expedia 追踪你所有的钱 像发短信一样发钱 以一种有趣的方式像专业人员一样增长你的财富 如果你选择接受它，你的任务是抓住我们的错误和提供你的反馈 让我们一次改变一个账户的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能网银应用，让你的钱和梦想连接起来。

localize.description: Bankiom是一種爲你的錢而設的Expedia 追蹤你所有的錢 像發短信一樣發錢 以一種有趣的方式像專業人員一樣增長你的財富 如果你選擇接受它，你的任務是抓住我們的錯誤和提供你的反饋 讓我們一次改變一個賬戶的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能網銀應用，讓你的錢和夢想連接起來。

next.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
next.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。
